Source.Name: manaplus
Source.Summary: Advanced 2D MMORPG client for The Mana World and Evol Online
Source.Description: ManaPlus is extended client for Evol Online, The Mana World and similar servers based on the eAthena fork. As a 2D style game, Evol Online creates a fantasy environment. The Mana World (TMW) is an effort to create an MMORPG. TMW uses 2D graphics and creates a large and diverse interactive world.
